name: iceland_songs
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool billboard_api.
Tool description: Providing the Billboard chart rankings and information on titles, artists, lyrics, images, and more. 
API description: Fetches the Iceland Songs chart information from the Billboard API for a specific date and range.

date.description: The date for which the chart information is requested, in 'YYYY-MM-DD' format.

range.description: The range of the chart information to fetch.
